name: Object Consulting
description:
Object Consulting is Australia's leader in delivering high quality, innovative, enterprise business solutions. Since 1989 Object's development, consulting, training and support services have kept customers at the forefront of innovation. Today, Object passionately believes that information technology has a major role to play as an enabler of sustainability. 
300+ strong, Object Consulting has main offices in Sydney and Melbourne with expansion into Brisbane and Canberra. 

Our core values, intellectual capital and assets, technical excellence and constant focus on exceptional customer service provide the framework for our corporate excellence.
